author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: إِذَا مسّتک البلایا في سبیلي أن اذکر بلائي وهجرتي وسجني کذلک نلقیک من لدن عزیز حکیم ل
translation: By My Self! The day is approaching when We will have rolled up the world and all that is therein, and spread out a new order in its stead. He, verily, is powerful over all things.
